item.title: Creating this Blog via Hugo
item.description: When starting a new project, picking the right frameworks and stack can make further development a lot more pleasant for your future self. Thinking about how I wanted to develop this blog was not an easy task. My first instinct was to purchase a monthly subscription to Ghost Blog. At the time, the lowest subscription was about $30 / month billed annually. For a casual blog with no revenue, this was way too expensive.
